definition[0]: a gardening tool with a row of metal teeth at the end of a long handle, used for making soil level, gathering up dead leaves etc
definition[1]: a man who has many sexual relationships, drinks too much alcohol etc
definition[3]: to move a rake across a surface in order to make the soil level, gather dead leaves etc
example[2]: She raked the soil over to loosen the weeds.
definition[4]: to search a place very carefully for something
example[3]: Iâ€™ve been raking through my drawers looking for those tickets.
definition[5]: to point something such as a gun, camera, or strong light, and keep moving it across an area
example[4]: The searchlight raked the open ground around the prison.
example[5]: They raked the room with gunfire.
definition[6]: to push a stick backwards and forwards in a fire in order to remove ashes
